title: Understanding Dandruff -- Symptoms
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

sections.heading: What Are the Symptoms of Dandruff?
bullets: Flakes of skin that range from small and white to large, greasy, and yellow
Itchy flaking that appears on the scalp or eyebrows; around the hairline, ears, or nose; or in the center of the chest or back

associated_bullets: Flakes of skin that range from small and white to large, greasy, and yellow
Itchy flaking that appears on the scalp or eyebrows; around the hairline, ears, or nose; or in the center of the chest or back

sections.heading: Call Your Doctor About Dandruff if:
content: Scaling is greasy and yellow and does not respond to over-the-counter dandruff shampoos and lotions; you may have seborrheic dermatitis and need more aggressive treatment to relieve the redness, itching , and flaking.
